WARNING: This is not an unofficial tournament. Basically, there will be lots of teams combined into 2 teams. They will just battle it out on maps listed below. WARNING: THERE IS NO PRIZE AND THIS IS JUST FOR FUN
Maps: Rendezvous CTW 3.5, Senex CTW and Springwood (A 2 team walls map)
